price: Мусода ҳам бор. Ўшанда уни Фиръавнга очиқ ҳужжат билан юборгандик.
arabic: وَفِي مُوسَىٰٓ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wafī mūsā idh arsalnāhu ilā fir'ʿawna bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
